columns.name: organisation_path
columns.dc:title: Organisation Path
columns.schema:description: A sequence of colon separated Organisation Keys that fully specifies the Provider Organisation providing a service to the client.

columns.name: twb_referral_out_key
columns.dc:title: TWB Referral Out Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each referral out. The Referral Out Key is unique and stable for each referral out at the lvel of the organisation.

columns.name: episode_key
columns.dc:title: Episode Key
columns.schema:description: This is a number or code assigned to each PMHC MDS episode. The Episode Key is unique and stable for each episode at the level of the organisation. This key must link to an existing episode within the PMHC MDS.

columns.name: twb_referral_out_provider_type
columns.dc:title: TWB Referral Out - Provider Type
columns.schema:description: The provider type of the referral out made for and on behalf of the client.

columns.name: twb_referral_out_date
columns.dc:title: TWB Referral Out - Date
columns.schema:description: The date the Service Provider made the referral out to an external service/organisation.

columns.name: twb_referral_out_status
columns.dc:title: TWB Referral Out - Status
columns.schema:description: The status of a referral out made by the Service Provider on behalf of a client.

columns.name: twb_referral_out_tags
columns.dc:title: TWB Referral Out - Tags
columns.schema:description: List of tags for TWB Referral Out.
